title: Japan’s Sanae Takaichi is proving a surprisingly popular prime minister
summary_full: The unconventional leader — for starters, she’s a woman — has called an early election for Feb. 8 in an effort to win a broad public mandate for change.
summary_public: The unconventional leader — for starters, she’s a woman — has called an early election for Feb. 8 in an effort to win a broad public mandate for change.
